resources.string: Όλα τα βίντεο είναι διαθέσιμα δωρεάν για όλους.
Μπορείτε να αναζητήσετε βίντεο επιλέγοντας ετικέτες από την αριστερή στήλη.

string.name: weHaveCarefullySelectedX
string.comment:
%s is the number of videos.
Appears on https://lichess.org/video

resources.string: Έχουμε επιλέξει προσεκτικά %s βίντεο μέχρι στιγμής!

string.name: xFreeCarefullyCurated
string.comment: %s is the number of videos. Appears in social media embeds (i.e. OpenGraph information) when linking Lichess videos.

string.name: xCuratedChessVideos
string.comment: %s is the number of videos. Appears in social media embeds (i.e. OpenGraph information) when linking Lichess videos.

string.name: xWithTagsY
string.comment:
%1$s is the number of videos found.
%2$s is a list of tags.
Appears when filtering for videos by tag.

string.name: freeForAll
string.comment:
Appears in social media embeds (i.e. OpenGraph information) when linking Lichess videos. Part of a longer piece of text.
The full text will be something like "%s carefully curated chess videos • free for all"

plurals.name: nbVideosFound
plurals.comment: %s is the number of videos found when searching on https://lichess.org/video

resources.string: Δε βρέθηκαν βίντεο με τις ακόλουθες ετικέτες:
Αυτά είναι όλα τα βίντεο που βρέθηκαν με τις εξής ετικέτες:

string.name: thatsAllWeGotForThisSearchX
string.comment:
%s is the search term that the user entered.
Appears at the end of a list of search results on https://lichess.org/video

resources.string: Αυτά είναι όλα τα βίντεο που βρέθηκαν για την αναζήτηση: «%s»

string.name: thereAreNoResultsForX
string.comment: %s is the search term that the user entered.

resources.string: Δε βρέθηκαν βίντεο που να αντιστοιχούν στον όρο αναζήτησης \"%s\"

string.name: viewMoreTags
string.comment:
Appears as a link on https://lichess.org/video
The link leads to https://lichess.org/video/tags

resources.string: Δεν ήταν δυνατή η εύρεση του βίντεο!

string.name: xByY
string.comment:
%1$s is the video's title.
%2$s is the video's author. This will be the author's display name on YouTube.
Appears in embeds on social media platform, when a Lichess video is linked.
Examples: "Chess Fundamentals #1: Undefended Pieces by IM John Bartholomew" "Chess Traps: Halosar Trap by thechesswebsite"

string.name: allNbVideoTags
string.comment: %s is the number of video tags. Appears on https://lichess.org/video/tags
